content:
Let's add Ryan to your spreadsheet.

**Adding Ryan to the Spreadsheet:**

| Name | Contact Info | How We Met | Date Met | Location | Topic/Industry | Follow-up Date | Notes | Next Steps | Status |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Alex | alex@email.com, 555-1234 | Conference | 2023-02-10 | Downtown Conference Center | Software Engineering | 2023-02-24 | Discussed AI trends | Send follow-up email | New |
| Jane Smith | janesmith@linkedin.com | Mutual Friend | 2023-01-25 | Coffee Shop (Uptown) | Marketing | 2023-03-01 | Need to discuss collaboration | Schedule meeting | Follow-up Sent |
| Bob Johnson | bobjohnson@gmail.com, 555-5678 | Networking Event | 2023-01-15 | Co-working Space (Midtown) | Finance | 2023-02-15 | Interested in meeting for coffee | Set up coffee meeting | Meeting Scheduled |
| Sarah | sarah@email.com, 555-9012 | Conference | 2023-02-12 | Downtown Conference Center | Writing/Freelance | 2023-02-26 | Discussed writing projects | Send follow-up email | New |
| Ryan | ryan@email.com, 555-1111 | Coffee Shop | 2023-02-14 | The Daily Grind (Downtown) | Graphic Design | 2023-02-28 | Discussed design trends | Send follow-up email | New |

**Tips:**

* Make sure to specify the exact coffee shop location where you met Ryan, so you can recall the details of your meeting later.
* You can use the "Notes" column to jot down any specific design projects or ideas you discussed with Ryan, which can help you follow up with him more effectively.
* Consider reaching out to Ryan to discuss potential collaborations or projects you can work on together.

How's that? Let me know if you need any help with anything else!
